about_the_game:
Welcome to Edge of Infinity. In this gripping third-person multiplayer space sandbox adventure, immerse yourself in a universe teeming with immersive simulation elements that elevate the gaming experience to new heights.
Engage in adrenaline-pumping battles both inside and outside of colossal capital ships, where every decision directly impacts the outcome of the battle unfolding before you. With the power to disable crucial ship components such as life support, gravity generators, and communications, the tide of battle can shift in an instant, offering unparalleled opportunities for cunning tactics and thrilling gameplay moments.
Forge your path to victory by spawning as a custom-created class or embodying your uniquely tailored hero, each with their own distinct abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer to unleash devastating firepower or employ stealth and sabotage tactics, Edge of Infinity empowers you to shape the course of battle according to your preferences and strengths.
Prepare to be transported to awe-inspiring environments that serve as the backdrop for each pulse-pounding confrontation. From intense broadside duels with towering destroyers to high-stakes skirmishes over the control of space stations, every battle in Edge of Infinity unfolds in a meticulously crafted setting, offering a fresh and exhilarating experience with each encounter.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

short_description: Edge of Infinity is a multiplayer space warfare game. Enter your starship and challenge your friends to all-out battles across the stars. Each match will be unique; containing different ships, weapons, armies, and strategy - all decided by the player.
